CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers |
| spirobifluorene - based copolymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers |
| spirobifluorene - based copolymers |

(Note: "PCE" stands for Power Conversion Efficiency)
